meanings.definition: In a semi-professional manner or capacity.
meanings.sent1: She sang semiprofessionally at local events.
meanings.sent2: He plays the guitar semiprofessionally on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat danced semiprofessionally to entertain the guests.
meanings.sent4: The flowers swayed semiprofessionally in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The chef cooked semiprofessionally, impressing everyone with his skills.

meanings.definition: Done with some level of professionalism but not as a full-time occupation.
meanings.sent1: She pursued a semiprofessional career in photography.
meanings.sent2: The team consists of semiprofessional players.
meanings.sent3: His semiprofessional magic tricks always amazed the audience.
meanings.sent4: The old clock ticked semiprofessionally, reminding him of time passing.
meanings.sent5: The artist created semiprofessional paintings that captured the essence of nature.
